source.dc2910e8:
import rasterio
from rasterio.plot import show
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.5c9e4733:
# GeoTIFF image of the Monthly Precipitation of January 2010
img_Prec_Jan_2010 = rasterio.open('../input/monthly-precipitation-totals-for-the-entire-world/wc2.1_2.5m_prec_2010-01.tif')
value_min = 0
value_max = 255
plt.figure(figsize=(15,10))
show(img_Prec_Jan_2010, vmin=value_min, vmax=value_max)
source.24ae157f:
# GeoTIFF image of the Monthly Precipitation of July 2010
img_Prec_July_2010 = rasterio.open('../input/monthly-precipitation-totals-for-the-entire-world/wc2.1_2.5m_prec_2010-07.tif')
value_min = 0
value_max = 255
plt.figure(figsize=(15,10))
show(img_Prec_July_2010, vmin=value_min, vmax=value_max)
